channel.title: VR technician on Frederik la Cour
channel.description: Recent content in VR technician on Frederik la Cour

item.title: Hybrid Sensation
item.description: Immersive and multisensory experience involving interaction and physical contact with actors and participants. Multisensory interaction within the virtual and physical reality. Produced by Jakob la Cour Studio Performed at The Royal Danish Theatre, Skuespilhuset As part of K:SELEKT
